item.description:
We are back in Medford!

 

Join us as we hear from Jessica Vaughan of the Center for Immigration Studies.  SHe will discuss the effects of illegal immigration on our state and nation as well as instruct us on the details of the "Secure Communities" policy and our Governor's attempts to avoid instituting this mandatory Federal policy.

 

For an $8 chip in, you can join in the pizza dinner as well.  Beverages are separate.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the private dining room.
item.name: March Medford Meeting - Greater Boston Tea Party
